Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both parties and is worth $800,000 to you. Considering its unparalleled quality and unique features, I propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer represents an outstanding opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
